short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes tabs when you open more than specified (default: 10, default method: new tab)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is to forcefully limit the number of tabs allowed open in a browser window. There are options to set a specific number, the default is 10. There is also the option to change the method of how tabs are discarded. It can either stop a new tab from opening, close the first tab on the list, or close one entirely at random.
